etphoneshome.entities.actor

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etphoneshome.entities.actor.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Enemy

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as the parent class for the Character and the Enemy. Using the getLocation method returns a location object. Using setLocation allows you to set the actor's location to a specified location. Using getIsDead checks if this actor is currently dead. Using setIsDead allows you to set whether this actor is currently dead. Using getHealth returns the current health of the actor. Using setHealth allows you to set the health of the actor and updates isDead status accordingly. Using takeSinglePointOfDamage applies a single point of damage to the actor health and updates isDead status accordingly. Using getEntitySprite returns the image object of the actor. Using setEntitySprite allows you to change the image object of the actor using a URL/file path address.

      A variable that tracks if the actor is facing right or left

      private javafx.scene.image.Image leftEntitySprite
      A placeholder image associated with a generic actor
      private Location location
      Location associated with the actor
      private javafx.scene.image.Image rightEntitySprite
      A placeholder image associated with a generic actor
      private Velocity velocity
      The velocity object associated with the actor with the default values of 0
